text: Can you add (or reference) custom modules within custom modules?
Hi <@UGLB3KRLH> you can use jQuery to clone a module a paste inner module
are there any plans to add the "View live example?" button back to the custom modules in the marketplace?

<https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/kelp-agency/simple-photo-gallery>
:point_up_2: - you used to be able to try out the module before you buy it
I think they plan to. They said they took it down because it didn’t work properly for a large amount of marketplace items
oh okay, i didn't realize that
i only realized it once someone emailed me for more information and I almost replied "Just click on the view live example button!" before i saw it wasn't there haha
yea, they had posted an announcement about it in the  releases slack channel but looks like it bit the dust

Hi folks, my first comment and question: I am trying to customize the advanced menu by simply adding a pipe and space between Nav items… anyone know of any documentation on this or what is the best approach to do this - basically I want to add style to a top nav… Thoughts?
